revised_title: Discovering the Root Structure of Lyginodendron and Kaloxylon
tldr: The author discusses their findings on the root structure of Lyginodendron and Kaloxylon, revealing that Kaloxylon was not an independent plant but an adventitious root of Lyginodendron. This discovery provides a complete understanding of the vegetative organs of Lyginodendron, including its stem, foliage, and roots.
